heading: HR00101
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT COORDINATING COUNCIL (HUDCC) AND THE HOME GUARANTY CORPORATION (HGC) TO REVIEW THE FRAMEWORK PLAN OF THE COMMONWEALTH ENTERPRISE ZONE AT THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT CENTER WEST IN QUEZON CITY TO ACCOMODATE THE RECOMMENDATION OF THE ORGANIZED PEOPLE'S ORGANIZATIONS THREAT WHOSE MEMBERS ARE DIRECTLY AFFECTED BY THE PROJECT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT since 2016-08-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00101
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT COORDINATING COUNCIL (HUDCC) AND THE HOME GUARANTY CORPORATION (HGC) TO REVIEW THE FRAMEWORK PLAN OF THE COMMONWEALTH ENTERPRISE ZONE AT THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT CENTER WEST IN QUEZON CITY TO ACCOMODATE THE RECOMMENDATION OF THE ORGANIZED PEOPLE'S ORGANIZATIONS THREAT WHOSE MEMBERS ARE DIRECTLY AFFECTED BY THE PROJECT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
